alert.note: Alert for Champaign; De Witt; McLean; Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:01AM CDT until June 29 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN PIATT...NORTHEASTERN DE WITT...SOUTHEASTERN MCLEAN AND WESTERN CHAMPAIGN COUNTIES... At 600 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mansfield, or 13 miles south of Gibson City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Broadcast media reported quarter size hail in Farmer City. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Piatt, northeastern De Witt, southeastern McLean and western Champaign Counties, including the following locations... Galesville and Bellflower. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 145 and 166. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
